titleStmt.title: lyric verses to a reluctant bridegroom (?)

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Submit - Changed lunate sigma of τοῖς to final sigma in lin. 5.
Submit - Removed page numbers from publication info. Reprocessing so that the publication data displays properly.
Finalized - Adjusted metadata and the text in accordance with J. Bromberg's suggestions and the ed.pr. Ready to go.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Correct infelicities in the metadata; in the text, check and, if accepted, attribute editorial reading in l. 5 to Bromberg; add space in l. 13

Submit - Added metadata and Greek text, NY workshop. I made the following changes to the edition in O. Claud 2.409:
Line 1: Edition prints “υ” as wholly visible at beginning of line, which it is not. While the word is surely Θαυμάσιον, in fact only -μάσιον is clear, so I have written “υ̣”. Line 2: I supply “[ν]” at beginning of line, which is extremely likely following “σθε-” at the end of line 1. Line 5: Edition prints initial “ν” as unclear (“]ν̣εσιαις”), but in fact the letter is almost entirely lost (and the visible bit does not look to me like a “ν”), so I have written “].εσιαις” and added an editorial note that even Cockle is uncertain about it. Line 7: Edition prints initial “π” in πεποθημένε as visible on the ostracon, but (though almost certain) it is very unclear, so I have written “] π̣εποθημένε”. Line 8: Edition prints initial “ο” as clear on the ostracon, but (though almost certain) it is only partially preserved, so I have indicated as “ο̣”. Line 9: I have supplied [ν] at the beginning of the line, which is almost certain following κινδυ- at the end of line 8. Line 10: Edition does not recognize initial “μ” (prints blank under-dot), though it is partially visible, so I have written “μ̣ολως” Line 13: Edition does not recognize initial letter (prints blank under-dot), but again “μ” is partially preserved, so I have written “μ̣η”.
Commit - Added text from O. Claud. 2.409 with minor edits
Commit - Added text from O. Claud. 2.409
